Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute near Jackson/Hamlin
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses temp. rerouted near Jackson/Hamlin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses temp. rerouted near Jackson/Hamlin.

Buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Jackson/Hamlin, due to street blockage near Jackson/Hamlin.

Eastbound buses will operate via Jackson, Pulaski, Harrison, Independence and Jackson including the normal route streets.

Westbound buses will operate via Congress, Pulaski and Jackson.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays at LaSalle due to signal problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays at LaSalle due to signal problems.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
